settings.rtl_languages_info: Input the language codes to show languages in RTL layout. All codes must follow [ISO Language Code Table](https://www.w3schools.com/tags/ref_language_codes.asp) and separated using commas (Ex: ar,fa,ps)

inventory_status.low_stock_threshold_info: A whole number between 0 and 200 is recommended for setting the low stock threshold for stock countdown.
inventory_status.in_stock_message_info: Personalize the inventory status message on the product card and product information. Use {qty} in the message to show the current product stock (E.g. Only {qty} items left)
inventory_status.low_stock_message_info: Personalize the inventory status message on the product card and product information. Use {qty} in the message to show the current product stock (E.g. Only {qty} items left)

enable.label: Enable
enable.info: When product is out of stock, please make sure 'Continue selling when out of stock' is enabled in Shopify admin > Product detail page.
enable.option_3: When product is out of stock

comparison.paragraph: This feature enables the comparison of products, not variants. To customize the fields for comparison, modify the 'Product comparison' section in the Overlay group. Preview the outcomes on a Collection or Search page.
comparison.enable_info: Add "Add to Compare" buttons to product cards (collection, search pages), and product page to compare product information and metafields in a single grid.

settings.paragraph: Applies for product cards in all pages

show_inventory_status.label: Show inventory status
show_inventory_status.info: Selecting "Product sold" does not reflect the realtime inventory drop of the product. You must create a product metafield with the exact key "custom.product_sold" and fill in a custom number to show as the number of product sold.

sale_labels.paragraph_1: You can use these codes in the content:
sale_labels.paragraph_7: {count_down} for count down timer to end date. (Must enable schedule)

highlight_attributes.paragraph: Create product or variant metafields of Single line text type to show product highlighted features on product cards.

estimated_delivery_date.paragraph_1: You can use these codes in the message:
estimated_delivery_date.paragraph_2: earliest_delivery_date to show earliest delivery date.
estimated_delivery_date.paragraph_3: latest_delivery_date to show latest delivery date.
estimated_delivery_date.paragraph_4: delivery_duration to show the number of days left until delivery
estimated_delivery_date.paragraph_5: time_to_cut_off to show the amount of time left before cut-off time

overlay.show_quick_add_info: Add to cart right from product cards without opening quick view popup or going to the product page.

general.info: The settings below automatically add color swatches to the filter in collection and search page.
general.replace_color_with_variant_images: Replace color options with variant images

product_card.text_option_name_info: Fill in the name(s) of the option used as text swatch, phrases of different languages are separated by a semicolon (E.g. Size; Taille).
product_card.swatches_color_shown_by_default_info: Select 0 to show all available swatches on product cards.
product_card.swatches_text_shown_by_default_info: Select 0 to show all available swatches on product cards.

filter.info: To filter using additional color or image values, create metaobjects and metaobject references, then change the settings below as per your preferences. [Learn about showing visual filters using metaobjects.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/filters#visual-filters)

search_results.show_link: Show link to search results page

default.popular_search_terms_info: Recommend most searched terms in your store to customers, separated using a comma (E.g. t-shirt, running shoes,...)

speech_search.enable_info: Speech search is only available on Chrome for desktop or Android (will not work on iPhone).

search_exclusion.paragraph: Exclude collections from in-store search and automatic recommendations.

settings.favicon_image_info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32 px

settings.custom_payment_icons_svg_info: Customize your payment icons. For example, fill in this field your chosen methods: apple_pay, google_pay, tabby, tamara. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/themes-by-shopify/vintage-themes/customizing-vintage-themes/add-credit-card-icons#edit-the-code-for-your-payment-icons)
settings.enable_discount_code_field_info: In case a free shipping code is applied, the discounted shipping fee will be reflected only in checkout page.

cart_custom_field.enable_custom_field_info: "Field label" must be filled in to enable custom field.
cart_custom_field.validation_regex_info: For field validation purpose. Please avoid using it if you’re not familiar with Regex. For assistance with Regex or fixing issues that arise from it, please [contact our support](https://omnithemes.com/contact/).

cart_upsell.paragraph_1: If enabled in mini cart and cart page, upsell recommendations can be shown following this priority (from high to low):
cart_upsell.paragraph_2: (1) by creating a product metafield in cart upsell and this field is not blank. [See our user guide for further details.](https://support.omnithemes.com/blogs/maximize-theme-settings/cart)
cart_upsell.paragraph_3: (2) by selecting a list of products manually in the settings below
cart_upsell.paragraph_4: (3) by using dynamic recommendations based on Shopify product recommendations. [Learn more.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)
cart_upsell.product_info: If you use a product metafield to add upsell products, leave this field blank.

settings.enable_info: Show Reorder button from customer account and customer order pages

free_shipping.order_amount_info: Enter the rules for order amount(s) to qualify for free shipping (one rule per line). Format instructions and examples are as follow:
free_shipping.paragraph_1: amount (100) for orders from any country and currency without individually defined amount.
free_shipping.paragraph_2: currency code:amount (USD:100) for orders from any country using USD without individually defined amount.
free_shipping.paragraph_3: country code:currency code:amount (US:USD:100) for any orders from the US with the currency USD.

estimated_shipping_rates.paragraph: Display the estimated shipping cost at mini cart and cart page based on customer's address.

edt.min_day_info: The minimum number of days needed to ship all orders. Use a semicolon to differentiate between shipping markets if needed (e.g. US:6;GB:3), or fill in one number to apply for all available markets. Country codes should follow [ISO 3166 standard.](https://www.iban.com/country-codes)
edt.min_day_paragraph: To customize for each product, create a metafield with the key 'custom.delivery_date_min' and type 'Text'. [Learn more about creating metafields](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/custom-data/metafields/using-metafields) or [contact our support](https://omnithemes.com/contact/).
edt.max_day_info: The maximum number of days needed to ship all orders. Use a semicolon to differentiate between shipping markets if needed (e.g. US:6;GB:3), or fill in one number to apply for all available markets. Country codes should follow [ISO 3166 standard.](https://www.iban.com/country-codes)
edt.max_day_paragraph: To customize for each product, create a metafield with the key 'custom.delivery_date_max' and type 'Text'. [Learn more about creating metafields](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/custom-data/metafields/using-metafields) or [contact our support](https://omnithemes.com/contact/).

show_in_cart.label: Show in cart
show_in_cart.info: Show estimated delivery time under each item in cart, checkout page and order details.

edt_in_cart.paragraph: To customize message for each product, create a metafield with the key 'custom.delivery_date_message ' and type 'Rich text'. [Learn more about creating metafields.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/custom-data/metafields/using-metafields)
edt_in_cart.message_paragraph_1: You can use these codes in the message:
edt_in_cart.message_paragraph_2: earliest_delivery_date to show earliest delivery date.
edt_in_cart.message_paragraph_3: latest_delivery_date to show latest delivery date.

settings.custom_icon_info: For assistance with custom SVG code or fixing issues that arise from custom SVG code, please [contact our support](https://omnithemes.com/contact/).

settings.paragraph: Show your market currency as a single entity in the currency selection, rather than showing specific countries individually.

currency_codes.paragraph: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

custom_code.html_for_head_tag_info: Used for any custom HTML code to apply site-wide. Placed at the bottom of the <head> tag on all theme pages, except for checkout page.
custom_code.paragraph: For support with handling custom code or fixing issues related to custom code, please [contact us](https://omnithemes.com/contact/).

settings.show_original_collection_url: Show original collection URL for canonical tags
settings.show_original_collection_url_info: Show original URL for paginated collection pages as canonical tags.

business_info.info: Used to show in site's structured data and on Google's SERP graph card. Learn more about [organization schema](https://developers.google.com/search/docs/appearance/structured-data/organization).
business_info.address_info: Fill the address by order (all fields are optional): street address, address locality, address region, postal code, address country code. E.g: Rue Improbable 99,Paris,Ile-de-France,75001,FR
business_info.other_address_info: Provide multiple addresses if you have locations in multiple cities, states, or countries.

colors.heading: Heading
colors.color_scheme_info: To edit all your theme's colors, go to your color theme settings.

text.heading: Heading
text.highlight_info: Wrap your text between [] to add text highlights. E.g: Adding [marker] will underline [highlight] text.
text.open_link_new_window: Open this link in a new window

default_content_height.label: Default content height
default_content_height.info: Decide the height of content block shown before clicking "Read more".

text.title: Title
text.label: Label
text.subtitle: Subtitle

apply.apply_collections_info: Select collections to show this Featured icon block.

product.show_product_rating_info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-reviews)

carousel.show_navigation_arrows_info: Only applies to Slideshow carousel type

icon.another_icon_info: If you want to use different icons from the options above, look for an icon from our [icon list](https://support.omnithemes.com/blogs/maximize-common-guide/theme-icons-list) and fill the icon name here (E.g: badminton).

video.show_sound_control_info: Applies to auto play videos only.
video.paragraph: Shows when no Shopify-hosted video is selected.
video.enable_video_autoplay_info: Video will be muted when autoplay is on.
video.video_alt_text_info: Describe the video to make it accessible for customers using screen readers.

country_region_selector.info: To add a country/region, go to your [payment settings](/admin/settings/payments)

language_selector.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings](/admin/settings/languages)

countdown.paragraph: Set up exact time to stop the countdown on the announcement bar.

free_shipping.name: Free shipping
free_shipping.progress_message_info: Display when cart subtotal is less than free shipping goal. Use {amount_to_fs} to show the remaining amount needed for free shipping.
free_shipping.success_message_info: Display when cart subtotal is equal or greater than free shipping goal.

include_margins.label: Make section margins the same as theme

settings.paragraph: By default, the section displays all collections. Add blocks to feature specific collections in place of the default ones.

settings.email_info: Email is always required to submit the form.

form.name: Form item
form.options_info: Input values of dropdowns, radio buttons and checkboxes. Options are separated by a semicolon (Ex: Client;Partner;Retailer;Wholesaler)

settings.custom_liquid_info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

settings.drawer_menu_info: Add blocks named "Drawer menu" under this section to add promotion, images for each menu item.

collection_images.collection_image_metafield_info: Use metafield for image to have better ratio and quality. Applies to 2nd level menu only.

settings.menu_item_info: Fill in the name of the 1st-level item you want to turn into mega menu (e.g. Shop All)

settings.paragraph: Each email subscription creates a customer account.

event_tickets.ticket_link_info: Add a ticket page to sell tickets to attendees. Create a [digital product](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/digital-service-product/selling-services-or-digital-products) to provide more information about the event, and optionally hide it from product listings.

end_date.has_end_date: This event has an end date

settings.image_info: For recommended image sizes, check our user guide.

settings.show_more_info: "Show more" button will be disabled when Carousel is enabled.

countdown.paragraph: Add a countdown timer to instill a sense of urgency among your customers and encourage them to buy a product.

desktop_layout.number_rows_desktop_info: This applies when carousel is disabled.

settings.open_first_tab: Open the first tab by default

settings.hide_footer_on_page_info: Fill the page URL in relative path format without the full domain (e.g. /pages/landing page). One URL per row.

settings.number_of_columns_wide: Number of columns wide on desktop

settings.certifications_info: Locate the file in Admin > Content > Files and find their names. Fill in the names of image files to show as trust badges here, one file name per row. E.g. 'certificate-image.jpg'.

settings.custom_payment_icon_info: Add and rearrange payment icons manually by adding [payment names](https://shopify.dev/docs/api/checkout-ui-extensions/unstable/components/media/paymenticon), separated by commas (e.g. visa,mastercard,klarna).

country_region_selector.info: To add a country/region, go to your [payment settings](/admin/settings/payments)

language_selector.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings](/admin/settings/languages)

follow_on_shop.info: Display follow button for your storefront on the Shop app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

menu_highlight.highlight_menus_info: To highlight first-level menus, accurately enter their names, one per line. If you support multiple languages, enter the correct translations of menu names in this field.

settings.menu_info: Select menu to show up to 4 menu levels.

map.store_address_info: Google Map will find the exact location

pagination_style.info: Navigation arrows are disabled when image pagination is enabled, as the pagination itself provides navigation.

content.content_position_info: The overlay group is positioned opposite the content group, except when centered.

settings.columns_first_row: Number of columns on first row

settings.paragraph: When cart page layout is Side, add Subtotal and Checkout button blocks to show the Order summary information.
Add a description or image by editing your collection. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/collections/collection-layout)
settings.show_collection_image_info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

desktop_layout.image_info: Use this to alternate the default collection image.

filter_type.label: Desktop filter layout
filter_type.info: Drawer is the default mobile layout.

filtering_sorting.collapse_filter_info: Filters are hidden by default in Aside and Above layouts. Click 'Filters' above the grid to view them.
filtering_sorting.expand_filter_info: Only applies to Drawer and Aside filter type.

advanced_filter.enable_info: Show up to 3 filters in grid layout, with optional image display.
advanced_filter.key_value_info: Follow the format: [Filter label] : [columns]. For example, Color: 6 means showing 6 color value items in a row/slide. Leaving [columns] blank will automatically adjust the items. One label per row, maximum of THREE labels.
advanced_filter.enable_desktop_slider_info: Carousel is enabled on mobile by default.

sort.label: Sort collections by:
sort.info: Only applied when all collections are shown.

collection_card.image_style_info: Add images by editing your collections. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/collections)

settings.show_heading_info: If hidden, you should provide a h1 heading using the section heading for SEO purposes.

media.show_media_with_variant_selected: Only show media associated with the selected variant
media.paragraph: Fill in the option name used to classify each variant's media. Use semicolons to separate the option labels in different languages (e.g. Color;Colour;Couleur)

settings.show_tax_and_shipping: Show tax status and shipping policy

settings.paragraph_1: Show more details about the product's vendor following this priority (from high to low):
settings.paragraph_2: (1) by linking the vendor name to the collection of corresponding vendor. [Learn more](https://shopify.dev/docs/api/liquid/filters#link_to_vendor)
settings.paragraph_3: (2) by selecting a page to show page's content in a popup without leaving the current site. If enabling metafield to show vendor collection in admin, the link will be automatically applied here.

settings.paragraph: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-reviews)

size_chart.associated_option_name_info: Size chart link will show under this option.

settings.show_dynamic_checkout_info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)
settings.show_gift_card_recipient: Show recipient information form for gift card products

pickup_availability.pickup_availability_info: Learn how to setup this feature [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shipping/setting-up-and-managing-your-shipping/local-methods/local-pickup)

pre_order.message_info: Message will show under Pre-order button to provide more information about the item.
pre_order.pre_order_show_dynamic_button: Show dynamic checkout buttons for pre-orders

settings.paragraph: Link siblings with similar characteristics via a linking option.

link_option.label: Linking option
link_option.info: Use "Load sibling products' content only" when the siblings are of the same template, and the template content are mostly static. In case each sibling has distinct rich content (e.g. product reviews), use "Redirect to sibling product pages" to navigate users directly to the sibling product page.

settings.option_name_info: Name of the option that links the siblings (e.g. Color).
settings.collection_handle_metafield_info: Create a collection containing the option values as unique products. Create a product metafield to fill in that collection handle for each set of sibling products. Fill in the key of that metafield here (e.g. custom.sibling-collection)
settings.option_value_metafield_info: Create a product metafield to fill in the option value of each sibling product. Fill in the key of that metafield here (e.g. custom.sibling-color)

settings.number_product_per_page_info: Only applies when carousel is enabled.

settings.paragraph: Store owner will receive an email when customer fills in this form.
settings.show_when_product_unavailable: Only show when product is unavailable
settings.show_when_product_unavailable_info: Email alert will NOT be automatically sent to the customer. You will need to do this manually.

settings.paragraph: Customizable options are added options to allow products to have more than 3 options in default Shopify. These customizable options are not tracked in product inventory, and will NOT make any change to product prices.
settings.option_name_info: The option name must be unique.

text_options.paragraph: Only applies to options in Text type: Text field and Text editor
text_options.max_char_length_info: Input the maximum number of characters needed in the field. Only applicable if the option is required. Leave blank if no maximum length should be applied.
text_options.option_note_info: Add a note or explanation for this option.

select_options.paragraph: Only applies to options in Select type: Checkbox, Dropdown and Radio button
select_options.option_values_info: Input values for Select type options. Values are separated by a semicolon (Ex: Polo;V-Neck;Boat Neck)
select_options.min_values_req_info: Input the minimum number of values required to be selected. Only applicable for Checkbox, when the option is required. Leave blank if no limit should be applied.
select_options.max_values_allowed_info: Input the maximum number of values could to be selected. Only applicable for Checkbox, when the option is required. Leave blank if no limit should be applied.

file_upload.paragraph: Only applies to options of File upload

swatches.paragraph: Only applies to options in Swatches type: Text swatch and Color swatch.
swatches.swatch_values_info: Input values for text swatch or color swatch options. Each value is on one line. For color swatch, input in 'option name:color code' format. (Ex: White:#FFFFFF)

swatch_style.label: Swatch style
swatch_style.info: Only applies to color swatch and color picker options.

date_time.paragraph: Only applies to options in Date & Time type: Date, Time

settings.label_info: Use collection_name to show the collection name in the label.

settings.custom_payment_icons_info: Customize your payment icons. For example, fill in this field your chosen methods: apple_pay, google_pay, tabby, tamara. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/themes-by-shopify/vintage-themes/customizing-vintage-themes/add-credit-card-icons#edit-the-code-for-your-payment-icons)

settings.details_info: Use a colon to separate two columns in a table. Use a hyphen to indent rows. Add a new row with line breaks (using SHIFT + ENTER). [Learn more](https://support.omnithemes.com/blogs/maximize-sections-blocks/tabs#:~:text=%F0%9F%A4%94%20How%20to%20add%20a%20tab%20that%20shows%20content%20in%20table%20format%3F)

settings.paragraph: To customize message for each product, create a metafield with the key 'custom.delivery_date_message ' and type 'Rich text'. [Learn more about creating metafields.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/custom-data/metafields/using-metafields)
Allow for flexible fee charging, including options for extra services like installation and assembly.
settings.fee_charging_product_info: Choose 1 product to represent an additional fee. The selected product's inventory must not be tracked.
settings.alternative_title_info: Leave blank to use the original name from the admin.

option_1.option_note_info: Add a note or explanation for this option if necessary.

settings.paragraph: Image displays in-line with text before motion, then expands to full banner size after motion.

before_motion.heading_info: Insert an image using the placeholder format [img] within the line.

settings.paragraph: Each email subscription creates a customer account.
Avoid using H1 tag for page heading as it may affect SEO ranking.
To make editing easier, only the selecting popup is shown in Theme editor.
settings.image_info: Image is displayed on desktop only.

display_rules.show_on_mobile_info: For better website accessibility, we recommend that only one popup should be shown on mobile devices.
display_rules.enable_schedule_info: Set up start and end date in the 'Countdown timer' block to show popup on schedule.
display_rules.delay_info: Delay is disabled in theme editor for editing purposes.

minimal_popup.info: Show a small sticky message for the popup at the screen bottom. Clicking this message will open the full popup as configured.

settings.paragraph_1: Setup the exact time to start countdown timer and show the popup on the storefront.
settings.paragraph_2: Setup the exact time to end countdown timer and hide the popup on the storefront.

settings.text_info: Use coupon_code to show the coupon code within the text box.

settings.paragraph: Enable 'Add to Compare' in theme settings, add items, then click 'Compare' to view and modify results in a popup.

grid.text_empty_field: Text to use for empty fields

settings.link_vendor_to_associated_info: This links to a page listing all products from the specified vendor.

settings.title_info: This should be the name of the variant option, such as 'Color'.

product_metafield.name: Product metafield
product_metafield.metafield_key_info: Enter a product metafield key. For example: custom.use_conditions

settings.button_link_info: Auto-link to the chosen product if another link is not added.

product.product_info: Alternate the default product image with the "Custom image" setting.

settings.table_detail_info: Use a colon to separate two columns in a table. Use a hyphen to indent rows. Add a new row with line breaks (using SHIFT + ENTER). [Learn more](https://support.omnithemes.com/blogs/maximize-sections-blocks/tabs#:~:text=%F0%9F%A4%94%20How%20to%20add%20a%20tab%20that%20shows%20content%20in%20table%20format%3F)

settings.paragraph_1: Use this section to add labels and badges to your products and product cards. [See tutorials](https://support.omnithemes.com/blogs/overlay-group-1/user-guide-product-labels-badges)
settings.paragraph_2: In theme editor, click 'Save' to review the changes.

settings.paragraph: Sale label automatically displays on all discounted products.
settings.show_on_product_page_info: To show labels and badges in Product information and Quick view, please add the 'Labels and badges' block in those sections, or check [this guide](https://support.omnithemes.com/blogs/maximize-overlay-group/product-label).

display.label_position_info: Does not apply with scrolling label styles.

settings.paragraph: Sold out label automatically displays on all unavailable products.

settings.content_info: Display each label's content in a single row to create a continuous label on product cards.

schedule.paragraph: Set up to show labels on start time and hide on end time.
schedule.paragraph_start: Set up exact time to start showing labels and badges.
schedule.paragraph_end: Set up exact time to stop showing labels and badges.

day_start.label: Show label within the number of days since

navigation_panel.collection_select_placeholder_info: Placeholder text for the first dropdown selection.

filter_1.filter_name_info: Fill in an exact label of a filter created in your filter app (e.g. Search and Discovery). If multiple languages are available, use translation apps to localize the filter label and fill them here, separated by a semicolon (e.g. Price;Preis;価格)

settings.paragraph: Dynamic recommendations use order and product information to change and improve over time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/themes/development/recommended-products)

specification_detail.list_of_spec_info: List the labels and product metafield keys, one per line, in the following format of label:metafield_key (e.g. Material:custom.material). Modify the 'metafield_key' part to suit your preference.

layout.number_of_columns_info: Only applies when a carousel is not used on mobile.
layout.media_position_info: Does not apply for overlay content.

settings.row_spacing_info: Applies to vertical layout (background image 400-450px tall).

product_card.show_quick_view_info: View product details in a popup without leaving the current page.
product_card.quick_view_button_label_info: "Quick view" will be used as default

settings.paragraph: Section is hidden if there's no product viewed yet.

Create a collection metafield with the key "related_collections" and type Collection (List of collections). Go to each collection page in admin and select the collections in the metafield to show in this section. If no metafield data is found, the theme detects the related collections automatically based on the collections of the product in current collection.

settings.button_label_info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

settings.paragraph: Use the Sidebar to display Table of Contents, promotional banners, highlight messages, feature products, and showcase relevant blog tags to enhance user engagement or facilitate other purposes.
No customizable settings available.

settings.image_ratio_info: Applies specifically to images displayed within tabs.
settings.location_name_info: The store name needs to match the name of your store defined in your [location settings](/admin/settings/locations).
settings.location_address_info: Google Map will find the exact location.

button.navigation_button_label_info: The button redirects you to Google Maps for the specified address.

settings.show_product_description_info: Product descriptions are automatically displayed on product pages. For other pages, manually input the desired description in the provided fields

tab_content.content_page_info: This overwrites the content added below.

desktop_layout.number_of_cards_info: Horizontal layout displays a maximum of two cards per row.

number_of_cards.info: Horizontal layout displays one card per row.

settings.paragraph: Selected schemes are applied for desktop only.

settings.menu_info: Only show the first level of the selected menu.

settings.show_hero_info: Enable if this section is used as hero, disable if not.
settings.custom_horizontal_position_info: Only applicable to the Custom desktop position.
